Name: Bubble Sweeper
About the game: Bubble Sweeper is a fresh take on the classic game of MineSweeper. In addition to the traditional square playfield, Bubble Sweeper offers a variety of shapes and sizes to keep the game interesting. The clean graphics and satisfying sounds of popping bubbles make for an enjoyable experience. And if you accidentally hit a mine, the game is not over yet! You'll have a chance to finish the game before the timer runs out. Challenge yourself with the different playfield layouts, sizes, and difficulty levels! The perfect game for short play sessions! Choose from different field layouts, shapes, and difficulty settings. Enjoy updated, polished graphics and that satisfying sound of popping bubbles. Second chance to finish the game before timer runs out
